metadata.title: CVE-2016-5321 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The DumpModeDecode function in libtiff 4.0.6 and earlier allows attackersto cause a denial of service (invalid read and crash) via a crafted tiffimage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5321` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
